General.Name: Guangdong Wens Foodstuff Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wens Foodstuff Group Co., Ltd. operates as a livestock and poultry farming company in China. The company engages in the breeding of chickens, pigs, ducks, geese, pigeons, and other breeds; food processing that includes livestock and poultry slaughter deep processing, and dairy processing; farming equipment manufacturing; and provides veterinary biological products, veterinary pharmaceutical preparations, and feed additives. It is also involved in the fresh food chain operation; and industrial investment, mergers and acquisitions, and financial investment services. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Wens Foodstuff Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wens Foodstuff Group Co., Ltd. in August 2018. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Yunfu, China.
General.Address: No.9, Dongdi North Road, Yunfu, China, 527400
